function_call.name: classify_risks_PESTLE
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Inadequate hygiene standards in food service establishments","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate monitoring of staff health and provision of protective clothing","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Sending food to healthcare workers in various hospitals may contribute to the spread of contagious diseases if proper hygiene measures are not taken in the food preparation and delivery process.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Frequent change in risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Potential spread of contagious diseases due to increased foot traffic in restaurants and cafes","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Financial impact on restaurants and cafes if the campaign is not successful","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Risks of fraud or misuse of
